title: Pickpocketing hand
text:
Once per game
round you may take a random card from an opponent’s hand.

title: Snooper’s eye
text: Once per game round you may look at an opponent’s cards in hand.

title: Roentgen eye
text: Once per game round you may look at the top card of the quest deck.

title: Stone skin
text: When you lose more than one life, you lose one life less.

title: Regeneration
text: You may play upgrades providing lives from dicard pile as you have them in your hand.

title: Grenade launcher
text: Discard this card from play during testing your power before rolling dice. Test is automatically successfull.

title: Poisoned torpedo
text: Discard this card from play during testing your speed before rolling dice. Test is automatically successfull.

title: Pyrokinesis
text: X😀 or X😬

title: Flaming farts
text: all X🙁

title: Levitation
text: all X🙂

title: Hypnosis
text: all X😀

title: Blinding light
text: Reroll any number of dice in any test.

title: Shrinkage
text: X😬

title: Demonic speed
text: X😬

title: Invisibility
text: X😬

title: Vision
text: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck and sort them as you wish.

title: Intuition
text: Look at the top 5 cards of upgrade deck and sort them as you wish.

title: Confusion
text: In any test, set all dice to opposite side.

title: Offer a sacrifice
text: During your test choose an opponent which has to try it instead of you. Reroll the dice.

title: Nostalgic memories
text: Take one card from any discard pile.

title: Demonic inspiration
text: Draw three cards.

title: Fake trust
text: During an opponent’s test choose a player, who has to try it instead of original player. Reroll the dice.

title: Allure into trap
text: During an opponent’s turn before choosing a quest you choose which quest the player has to try to achieve.

title: Random teleportation
text: During any test the player has to try new quest from the top of the deck instead of the original. Reroll the dice.

title: Rabbit’s foot
text: Pay immediately after another VOODOO card. The card is cancelled.

title: Sun eruption
text: Pay immediately after another VOODOO card. The card is cancelled.

title: Unexpectable fart
text: Pay immediately after another VOODOO card. The card is cancelled.

title: Brain electroshock
text: In this turn after evaluating the quest the player has to try to achieve an additional quest.

title: You have found a lollipop
text: Draw 2 upgrades and play 1 upgrade.

title: Discounted energy drink
text: Draw 2 upgrades and play 1 upgrade.

title: Chocolate cake with strawberries
text: Draw 3 upgrades and play 1 or 2 upgrades.

title: Rot
text: Discard one of opponent’s upgrade providing rerolling during test.

title: Undescribable nasty trick
text: Switch all cards in your hand with an opponent.

title: Resurrection
text: All Zombies become Animatrons. Replenish their arms and legs. Draw 1 card.

title: Charity container
text: Choose a direction. Each player gives the cards in their hand to the player in the chosen direction.

title: Detoxication
text: Choose an opponent which has to dicards all cards in their hand except one.

title: You pissed off the fans!
text: Play after opponent’s successfull test. You get the quest instead of them.

title: Two birds with one stone
text: Play after successful test. The player automatically achieves another available quest which requires testing the same attribute.

title: Fortune favors the bold
text: Play before revealing random quest from the top of the deck. Test will be automatically successfull.

title: Audience requires repeat
text: Play after successfull test. The test has to be repeated.

title: Scandal
text: Choose a direction. Each player gives one of their achieved quest to the player in the chosen direction.

title: Clanger
text: Choose an opponent and one of their neighbour. The player has to give one of their achieved tests to that neighbour.
